dict.string: Calmpath reads your Health data (steps, sleep, and heart metrics) to enrich migraine logs and insights.
Calmpath uses your location to fetch local weather and optionally record where migraines occur.
Calmpath uses Motion & Fitness to detect your movement state (e.g., walking or stationary) around migraine onset.
Calmpath reads your calendar to include overlapping or recent events (with location) in migraine logs.
